page.title: 10Steeple Morden Gymkhana
page.content: The Steeple Morden Gymkhana is one of the main events of the year.People come from far and wide just to participate in the Gymkhana. There are main events such as: Best turned out pony Fancy dress Gymkhana events These are normaly the very popular ones.There are Horse events like jumping here are a few: Peter pan Minimus Speedy pony You are given a rosette if you get a clear round except for the Speedy Pony Games in the main ring are like party games but on a pony you are given money if you come 1st,2nd or 3rd. Cups and Prizes are given for the person with most rosettes,fancy dress and most determained rider.
